TopicTitle: Adding subassemblies still messes up staging

Articles.Content:
In abstract, staging queues should be a <queue> of <stages>.</stages></queue>

Adding a sub assembly should add to the end of the <queue> all of the <stages> sequentially</stages></queue>

What occurs is a strange blending of <stages> so you end up with a <queue> of <stages> that you have to try and work out.</stages></queue></stages>

Honestly, I really like the *idea* of subassemblies but every single time I implement them, I have half an hour of figuring out the staging again because the automation has completely fubarred them.
